raw_comment:
I notice that with a legacy applicant you are more likely to be admitted overall. 
I wonder if this goes the same way for scholarships granted to students. 
This relate to me because I will have to think about going to college and a lot of people at my high school will be thinking about them too. 
College: Lucre or legacy?
ace_sentences: A legacy applicant is more likely to be admitted overall.
I wonder if scholarships are granted in the same way.
I will have to think about going to college.
Many people at my high school will think about going to college too.
The headline is: College: Lucre or legacy?
